info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:43PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT COLUMBIANA...NORTHWESTERN BEAVER AND LAWRENCE COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM EDT... At 943 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Niles to North Canton. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... New Castle, Salem, Columbiana, East Palestine, Ellwood City, Calcutta, Ohioville, Lisbon, New Wilmington, Oakwood, Leetonia, New Castle Northwest, New Waterford, Big Beaver, New Beaver, Pulaski, Bessemer, New Bedford, Plain Grove Township, and Koppel. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 107 and 110. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 4 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
